wikipedia_page.main: Henry Robertson Bowers (29 July 1883 – c. 29 March 1912) was one of Robert Falcon Scott's polar party on the ill-fated Terra Nova expedition of 1910–1913, all of whom died during their return from the South Pole.

response: * Henry Robertson Bowers (1883–1912), Royal Navy Lieutenant who was part of the ill-fated Terra Nova Expedition, which attempted to be the first to reach the South Pole
*1912 – Henry Robertson Bowers, Scottish lieutenant and explorer (b. 1883)
** Henry Robertson Bowers, Scottish naval officer (b. 1883)
** Henry Robertson Bowers, Scottish polar explorer (d. 1912)
* Henry Robertson Bowers (1883–1912), nicknamed "Birdie",  participant in Robert Falcon Scott's doomed race to the South Pole
